description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5iuu6","text":"This protocol details data and sample sharing in an experimental medicine study of seasonal influenza vaccination responses in Lymph nodE single-cell Genomics in AnCestrY (LEGACY01).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"cbogm","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90b2n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtm83","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

groups.title: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"cpoot","text":"DATA AND SAMPLE SHARING","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a56vj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fef4u","text":"The protocol will be published and made open access during the study. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jf3g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffatr","text":"During the study, data will be shared through controlled access using the following principles:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bki1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uv88","text":"No data should be released that would compromise an ongoing trial or study. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do6qv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h3gq","text":"There must be a strong scientific or other legitimate rationale for the data to be used for the requested purpose. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbf26","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qk0c","text":"Investigators have a period of exclusivity in which to pursue their aims with the data before data are made available to other researchers. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45g4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bthiu","text":"Adequate resources must be available in order to comply in a timely manner or at all, and the scientific aims of the study must justify the use of such resources. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"391dv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3d6pm","text":"Data exchange complies with Information Governance and Data Security Policies in all the relevant countries.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhmpt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nf99","text":"Researchers wishing to access study data should contact the chief investigator in the first instance. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ilou","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa28l","text":"New algorithms or methods of value to the broader community will be shared online via the GitHub and/or protocols.io websites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqv3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnfnf","text":"At the end of the study, single-cell data will be archived and made open access as part of the Human Cell Atlas data portal (https://data.humancellatlas.org/), and other data (e.g., imaging, bulk RNA sequencing, genotyping, flow cytometric, and serological data) will be made open access through deposition in the European Genome-phenome Archive (EGA; https//ega-archive.org), Cytobank (https://mrc.cytobank.org/cytobank/) and Zenodo (https://zenodo.org), for example. Meta-data deposited along with the sequencing data will be MINSEQE-compliant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":125,"length":32},{"key":1,"offset":435,"length":18}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DADFC452918E11EDA3310A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://data.humancellatlas.org"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DADFC4C0918E11EDA3310A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://zenodo.org"}}}}
keywords: Single-cell sequencing, lymph node, influenza vaccine, ancestry

parent_collections.title: An experimental medicine study of seasonal influenza vaccination responses in Lymph nodE single-cell Genomics in AnCestrY (LEGACY01)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

title: LEGACY01: DATA AND SAMPLE SHARING
